website_summaries.verdict: Compact and portable drum pad set. Great for the beginner and intermediate player alike. A useful rehearsal tool, with record function and USB out to connect to your computer.
pros: A seven pad and two foot pedal kit contains over 100 sounds in an easy to use interface
Large LED digital display shows information
Includes a built in Drum Trainer for beginners play along and practice to
Can be powered using six C batteries
cons: Some users find the foot pedals to be on the flimsy side

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Excellent for the price. Sounds great right trough the speakers. Lots of different sounds to choose from. Also worked perfectly with Garage Band -- the sounds were matched up perfectly with each pad without any assigning of notes, etc. Con: If you're careful you can usually avoid it, but you will probably get accidental double kicks with the included pedals. This doesn't really interfere with your playing, and this can be upgraded later if you choose to. I've played drums at church for a couple years but never had anything of my own to practice on. This is a great solution if you don't have a lot of money to invest in getting a full kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like the real thing
customer_reviews.text: WE HAVE FAMILY BAND AND MY HUSBAND PLAYS DRUMS. This fits in car with luggage and my keyboard and amp. Sounds like the real thing!! Even without amp this sounds good. Can play without sticks. I think I might want to learn to play it myself. Has lesson mode and midi files already preloaded to play along with. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My husband really wanted a table top drum set for christmas an after extensive searching i found that this one had great reviews as some of the other has mixed reviews. This was excellent table top drum set, great sound quality, my husband loves it and takes it with him everywhere! Bongos are a great added feature! I highly recommend if your in the market for one that you choose this one weather your a beginner or an expert, even the price was reasonable!
customer_reviews.author: K L

customer_reviews.title: WOW - MARCHING TO THE BEAT OF A DIFFERENT DRUMMER IS AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! I was overwhelmed by the options available with this system. If you are a beginner you are in for quite a ride. This would keep a kid - or those of us drumming in our heads since childhood - very happy. I received mine in record time and after 2 weeks I still haven't begun to master all the various voices or tunes. I am still finding my way in figuring out how to use head phones ( an adapter is necessary) while connecting to my computer and will post the answers ASAP. I think anyone with a love for the beat will enjoy this drum set.
customer_reviews.author: George E. Goff & Better Half MicheleTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice for a beginner or if you want something ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice for a beginner or if you want something to mess around with (can't speak from a professional purpose). Definitely recommend upgrading the pedals. Be careful if you get too happy as you probably will bang the display, don't want to crack it. 4 stars because I've only had it a couple of days and haven't had it long enough to see if anything will go wrong with it. Hope not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE PYLE DRUM IS GREAT!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE EVERYTHING ABOUT IT. I LIVE IN AN APARTMENT, SO IT NEXT TO IMPOSSIBLE TO HAVE A FULL SET OF DRUMS. i HAVE BEEN OUT OF THE LOOP FOR A WHILE DUE TO HAVING BOTH SHOULDERS REPLACED AS WELL AS BACK HIP ISSUES. I AM BACK!! THESE HAVE A MARVELOUS SOUND AND ALLOW ME TO PRACTICE WITHOUT DISTURBING A SOUL. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM WHETHER A BEGINNER OR NOT. I LOVE THE WAY THAT THEY CONNECT TO MY PC AND HAVE AUX INPUT FOR TELEPHONE OR OTHER MUSIC DEVICE. YOU CAN CONFIGURE THESE BOYS JUST ABOUT ANY WAS THAT YOU WISH. IT SURE BEATS THE COMMON PRACTICE PAD TO PIECES.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Wayne Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great First Drum Set - Lots of Features
customer_reviews.text: Gave this set to our 11 year old son for his birthday. He has really enjoyed all the features and it has a fabulously clear sound. It's easy to set up just about anywhere in the house. Preloaded songs are great for practicing. Shipping was timely and the unit was well packaged. Only suggestion is that if you're ordering it as a gift, make sure you're home when it arrives. There was no surrounding packaging, so it was a total give-away when he saw it sitting on our front porch. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: CCraige

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners. Kick pedal has issues. Rubber pad isnt as silent as you might want.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good kit for the beginners. However I had serious trouble with the pedal though. The kick pedal sometimes doesnt work as I want it too. And its not comfortable. It has so many sound kit and the sound quality is also pretty good. One more issue that I faced was because of the rubber pads. You put on the headphones but due to the rubber pads, you get the noise coming out of the pads. Its not as good as mesh pads. But hey, you cant expect anything better at this price.
customer_reviews.author: S M Jamil

customer_reviews.title: So nice! Daughters loves it! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! My daughter she’s 8, she asked for a real drum set and we didn’t want to invest a ton of money into something she may only use for a little while! We seen this and thought perfect! Perfect is what it is, sounds amazing, she can hook up her headphones, she can learn to play, record herself playing...best gift ever! It’s bigger then I excepted we have it setup in her room on a small table with the foot pedals underneath and a stool so she sits and drums for hours! If your wanting something small but still has sound, and is easy to use and is just like an actual bigger drum set this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Exposed packaging
customer_reviews.text: I’m lucky I happened to come home when I did, because it was at risk of being stolen due to the exposed packaging. I live in an apartment building in Brooklyn, and the picture shows how it looked as it sat in front of the mailboxes in the lobby. Aside from that, it works and sounds great. I just got it today so I haven’t explored all it’s features.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Dinan

customer_reviews.title: This is probably a great set of drums
customer_reviews.text: This is probably a great set of drums, well built and sturdy....but its not very intuitive for someone that is learning to play. I tried to look up youtube videos, but not much reference materials out there. Was not a good options for me.
customer_reviews.author: amazonregular

customer_reviews.title: He says it performs great! It has a lot of sound options
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, who drums in a cover band. He says it performs great! It has a lot of sound options, which makes practicing more fun. The response of the pads and pedals is also really good. But better than all that was the customer service. One of the pedals came apart and we contacted Pyle, got a quick response and a replacement pedal with no issue. Very nice, hassle-free. Would definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and impressive for its size.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my brother who is not musically trained but loves music and making beats with his hands on tables. This drum kit has great sound, a ton of different sounds, great volume control, feels sturdy and well built, and has a headphone jack to avoid upsetting neighbors (needs adapter for standard headphones). I would not say its super portable, its well sized and weighs a bit, but still easily moved. Friends and family had tons of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lalo

customer_reviews.title: Not a real drum set. A toy
customer_reviews.text: Had hoped to use this as a traveling drum set when transporting everything in my set would be to complicated. Just does not work for me. The layout of the drums makes playing it significantly different than a normal drum set. Also such simple things as rim shots not really possible. If for fun and don’t care about skills being transportable to real drum set then go for it otherwise pass.
customer_reviews.author: John B Melchiori

customer_reviews.title: Power did not work
customer_reviews.text: This kit has lots of neat features but after about 10 minutes the on/off power button no longer worked. It must be the AC adapter as it works fine with batteries. I will return this one and get a new one. Will update review then.
customer_reviews.author: LPATL

customer_reviews.title: Came with missing plug on #2 foot pedal
customer_reviews.text: Have tried to contact seller with no success. I like the product but can't seem to find a way to fix my problem.
customer_reviews.author: FIRO

customer_reviews.title: Awesome unit. No complaints other than the foot pedals ...
customer_reviews.text: Had it for about two months now. Awesome unit. No complaints other than the foot pedals aren't very responsive until you actually fasten them down to something. They're just too lightweight to stay put in use. Going to use velcro and some kind of wood platform or something to make sure they don't move and then they should respond correctly to each hit. If the foot pedals were better, it'd get 5 stars for sure.
customer_reviews.author: owlRnothing

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS SO MUCH FUN TO DRUM. Great stress relief.
customer_reviews.text: I have played piano for years and always loved playing with a drummer. I had a neighbor get this for her son for Christmas and it came recommended by a band teacher. I love turning the drum off and becoming the drummer for the settings I choose to drum along with. I look forward to coming home after work and just drumming away. I want all my friends to buy one of these and discover their hidden drumming talents. There are a bunch of fun percussion settings as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tripp

customer_reviews.title: The options that are offered are great and allows him to choose a variety of percussion ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product for our 3-year old son who loves tap on everything. The options that are offered are great and allows him to choose a variety of percussion instruments to keep his interest. The only thing that I found missing was a way to lock in a volume level so that my husband and I can manage the noise level. We've avoided plugging in headphones because we're concerned that he'd turn the volume up to maximum level with his headphones on. Otherwise, we are happy with the purchase and our son has loved playing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great beat!
customer_reviews.text: My son recd this for a Christmas gift. He is a drummer and is very impressed by the sound quality, heads and digital options for a multitude of sound effects. This is a very nice quality- you cant beat the price. Very satisfied! Impressed!
customer_reviews.author: SavyThinker

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old son to learn the drums on. I am amazed at the 100+ drum sounds that it produces as well as songs one can play along with. Also one can turn off certain tracks; like the drum track of a song to play your own beat or to practice ones memorization of the prerecorded beat to that track. My only complaint, but knew about the flaw from other reviews, is the delay or finicky nature of the hi hat pedal and the bass drum pedal. But overall for the price, realistic sounds and functionality I feel that it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ana S-Suarez.

customer_reviews.title: The sound is absolutely incredible!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old wanted a drum set so he could learn how to play. I did some research on the preferred brand or sets available in this price range. The quality and sound for 5 piece drum sets were not favorable so I began looking for other options. I found this Pyle electronic set and read the reviews which were the main reason I decided to purchase. The sound,quality and options far exceeded my expectations. The sound is absolutely incredible! My son loves this set. I highly recommend this set for anyone interested in a drum set.
customer_reviews.author: S.Halprin

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition, all pads, buttons and body have no flaws or scratches. Works as described and is exactly what I needed! I’ve owned a Yamaha dd65 and this is exactly the same in quality of pads, sound quality, and body quality all at a way better price! I’m having a great time learning to play, and using the midi to play real acoustic drum samples through my computer’s D.A.W.! Works awesome with mixcraft 9 and ez drummer! Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for the Drummer in your life
customer_reviews.text: Forget buying this for a kid, I bought this for my Other Half and he absolutely loves it! The quality is excellent! He is a professional drummer who always wanted an Electric Drum kit! He was so grateful and said that it far exceeds the value I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Awesome except the pedals
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great tabletop drum set. The sounds are great, and the playing surface feels very nice. The only issue is the pedals. They are usable, but not the best. I made my own bass drum pedal and now it's great! See my videos on this product by searching demonic sweaters pyle pted06 on YT.
customer_reviews.author: JuRo

customer_reviews.title: Kids and I love it, well worth the money, better than "real" drums.
customer_reviews.text: The kids (and I) have lots of fun drumming along with music on the radio and/or making up our own beats. Only thing is sometimes the bass drum pedal double taps but it's still a blast. Makes lots of different percussion sounds and has some internal tunes. Have not set it up to do our own mixes yet but it seems to have that potential, there are a lot of features that we haven't fully explored but it was money well spent and takes up less room than a "real" drum set, and the volume is adjustable. Pads work like real drums, harder hits make louder sounds, just great over all.
customer_reviews.author: Surftigr

customer_reviews.title: Great but very cheap material. I guess that’s what we get for the price..
customer_reviews.text: My first ever electric drum. I love it and very easy to play. I just wish materials were little better. I had issue with pedal not working within in a month so they replaced me with a new one which arrived very quick. Having another issue now with one of the speakers not working properly.
customer_reviews.author: shahir

customer_reviews.title: Good and affordable set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good ser, plenty of kits and voices to set the song you love, the pads are very accurate and resistant, the only downside is the pedals, they are terrible, accuracy is awfull and sometime give double kicks I don’t know if they are defective.
customer_reviews.author: SergioArb

customer_reviews.title: About the Recording Aspect...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I'm doing something wrong but I couldn't record with this electric drum-set very well at all! My recording software just didn't want to pick up this instrument very well. It might be my software but it might also be this kit! On the positive, it sounds great and is fun to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Adventure Island

customer_reviews.title: The Pyle electronic Drum Set packs an amazing array of drum sounds and kits that sound very ...
customer_reviews.text: The Pyle electronic Drum Set packs an amazing array of drum sounds and kits that sound very realistic. The only problem I had was with the two pedals. The drum machine has only one input for a pedal so I can't play the kick drum and high-hat at the same time. Also, the High-hat pedal cord is too short so when I plug it in it doesn't reach the floor; which I found quite puzzling. Despite these issues I like playing the drum machine without disturbing my wife and neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Messina

customer_reviews.title: Every percussion instrument you'd ever want.
customer_reviews.text: It's probably a little unfair writing a review after just a few weeks as this kit has so many features I haven't even scratched the surface. But so far I am impressed with the build quality. The drum pads are really responsive and provide a very authentic feel. The built in speakers aren't great, but a decent set of headphones makes a world of difference. In short, I have gone from a complete novice to rattling off several rock drum beats in less than a month. Gets my vote.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners or practice for pros
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drum set for beginners or practice for professionals. Sound quality is great. I suggest using clear poly tip sticks so you don't mar the pads. Everything is adjustable.** One exception is the power plug receptical on the unit broke off inside the set right after return date passed. Now I have to pay to have it repaired. = 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sego Sr

customer_reviews.title: then this is the best for the price and quality
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a real sounding drum set, this isn't it. Get a real drum set for that. If you are looking for something very close in sound to start off on or looking for something to feed the percussion beast in you, then this is the best for the price and quality. It matches with the more expensive name brands for a quarter of the price. Keep in mind that anything digital is bound to have some flaws compared to the real thing, so just expect it. For instance, you don't buy a $100 Strat and expect it to play like Slash's guitar. But it will be very close.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY FOR PRICE
customer_reviews.text: love tht when u hook it up thur midi it will control VST drums on ur compter thur my fl studio 12.5
customer_reviews.author: Keylo

customer_reviews.title: Pedals  are useless
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I bought this to test the waters on electronic drums, as I've been playing percussion for 30 years. The pads are good and the midi interface works well. Nice action. But the pedals are garbage. One doesn't work and has about a 2-foot cable. When I contacted the manufacturer about the bad part, they said "Sorry we don't have any replacements for that." So if you don't need to use your feet, this thing ain't bad. But don't buy it for the pedals, and don't contact the manufacturer if you expect to be treated well.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Great to inspire beginners
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great! My son very thrilled to have it, and easily figured out how to change the sounds. Of course, the spatial arrangement is nowhere near a real drum kit, but the sound is realistic enough to spark the interest for the next kit.
customer_reviews.author: drjonhandy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 11 year old budding musician
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic starter kit for my son, who is just getting into making music. My only complaint is the cord lengths are short. It was incredibly quick to set up and start playing. It works great with headphones, sounds great without. He hasn't used any of the midi interface capabilities yet, but it looks really promising.
customer_reviews.author: laernu

customer_reviews.title: Okay/So-So
customer_reviews.text: This is just “ok”. There can be a slight delay with the pads and an awful delay with the pedals. Also the pedals don’t respond well (sometimes not at all) when used with the high hat and snare for jazz drumming. The headphone feature is a must and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Dreena

customer_reviews.title: good quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son (9) for Christmas. He loves it though he would prefer the real drums but due to the limited space, this was better choice. So far he plays on it every day. He was able to learn one new song using the learn button. Though he complaints that many other songs are too fast for him to follow. Wish there was (maybe there is) a way to slow it down so he can learn to follow and then go to the regular speed.
customer_reviews.author: Ivana Sidlo

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy.
customer_reviews.text: Really just a toy. I went with an Alesis Surge kit after trying these. Cramped, control in front so it's gonna get beaten up if your sick hits it. Fine for a child or casual use. 4 stars as a toy, not for music production.
customer_reviews.author: My Banana has a First Name

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use standard headphones with this set
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to figure out the right adapter to be able to use headphones. Wish I would have known this before purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Todd Hudnall

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I waited 50 years for another drum set but had no room. This is absolutely perfect. The drums and cymbals sound great. Can't wait to try the other features.
customer_reviews.author: RG-TGO

customer_reviews.title: Real deal!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to the Management and Staff for the great service rendered! A great piece of Modern Technology ........ a state-of the- art music equipment. My grandson loves it! Nathalie
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 12 year old granddaughter as a Christmas gift. She loves it. We all took turns playing and were amazed at the sound quality - snare - base - etc. We are not percussionists or even musicians so don't know if you can actually learn to be a "drummer" but it is fun. After first day - thankful for headphones!! :)
customer_reviews.author: LoriK

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: The drum kit arrived lightning fast. So far, one month in and we are VERY satisfied with it. Sound quality is excellent. Overall response is great. The only exception so far being the drum pedals, as many have mentioned, occasionally can be a little touchy but we're looking into some of the fixes that others have used and seeing which works best. Overall, this a very high quality product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Has everything I was looking for and more.
customer_reviews.text: I like this drum pad! I was just looking for an electronic drum pad. I ended up ordering this item and it turned out to be so much more than I thought. It has tons of kits and voices to use, songs to play along with, a learning mode, MIDI abilities...too much too mention. Comes with power cord, sticks and pedals too. Well worth the price. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: 1Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing starter set. My 8 yr old has already started to make his own music Ana’s has recorded it onto the computer. It comes with a set of sticks as well
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great drum pad!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a beginner and just wanted to mess around, I was able to set up and play in minutes. I’m really having a lot of fun with this, many different drum kits and sounds, easily customizable, great drum machine!
customer_reviews.author: Fender Guitar Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great for practicing for drum lessons!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter drum set for my 9-year-old. I especially like the fact that he can adjust the volume or wear headphones to play. Purchased so that he could practice for drum lessons. Has been invaluable to allow him to continue his lessons through video during the COVID-19 quarantine. We have not come close to using all of its capability yet, but anticipate connecting it to a computer soon.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Counts

customer_reviews.title: ok, pedals got be better.
customer_reviews.text: foot pedals are very light. stepping on them makes them move all over the place. other than that I like it.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT FIORE

customer_reviews.title: ad they love it. however
customer_reviews.text: got 2 of these for my boys at XMAS, ad they love it. however, after a few hours i realized i forgot headphones, but took care of that quickly. 2 months after the holidays and they still play it just as much... highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joel Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly awesome, my 16 year old daughter loves this thing. As other reviewers stated that foot pedals are super sensitive but not a deal breaker
customer_reviews.author: Carl Birts

customer_reviews.title: Love this little drum kit.
customer_reviews.text: These are fun and they sound good. Got these for me and my 5 year old nephew to jam on. They are not always as responsive as they should be, but are perfect for the price and for what they are! Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Jax

customer_reviews.title: The touch sensitivity is very good, especially for cymbal effects
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality for the price. The touch sensitivity is very good, especially for cymbal effects. The built-in speakers sound great even with the toms and they can be quite loud. I don't use the pedals much yet. The pedals daisy chain, so only one cable reaches behind the drum kit.
customer_reviews.author: JeffNJ

customer_reviews.title: 11 year old really likes it
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year old daughter has been playing percussion for a couple of years. She got this for Christmas and has used it a lot more than I thought she would. She puts on headphones and bangs away.
customer_reviews.author: KBS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This product has excellent sound quality. I purchased for my 11 year old son who loves music. He is enjoying the 120 songs and the countless ways you can play music with this drum. The drum pads light up which also is helping him with the rhythm and anticipation of where the beat is headed next.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl R.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: Works great with headphones. I liked so much I moved up to a regular electronic drumset, but this was a great starter drum to see if you like the drums. Recorded very well to my Tascam recorder. Only problem was I had to take apart to fix a wire which had been pinched in assembly and had finally broken. Fixed the wire, and good as new.
customer_reviews.author: rickh2000

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drum machine
customer_reviews.text: This actually sounds great. I am very impressed with the sound and the options. I'm happy that I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P

customer_reviews.title: Fun and useful
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my music students. It's portable, has lots of sound options, and the kids love the rewarding sounds vs. a practice pad. I realize it's not the right dimensions for a real set, but the kids can still practice and learn rudiments.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: i just want to play the drum all day!
customer_reviews.text: What a blast! If you want to have a whole lot of fun without buying an entire drum kit, this is the way to go. It's easy to practice or play along with rock videos without disturbing neighbors. Friends who don't play drums have a lot of fun too. Sounds super!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and doesn’t take up a lot of space!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my 12 year old son, who has wanted a drum set for years but we don’t have the room for an actual set. He’s probably technically a beginner but he’s been drumming on any and everything for years and plays the drums in his band. He loves this set. The sound is really good and he hasn’t stopped playing it since he opened it. Great set that doesn’t take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: RidgeFam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I Iove this product. Jams are crazy fun and are great for even a long time drummer like myself (over 15 years of experience)
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Varga

customer_reviews.title: Product was as advertised. Well packed. Played it ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was as advertised. Well packed. Played it as soon as I received it, sounded close to real drums, even closer thru PA. Very conten with this product. Shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: John Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: See them smile!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our granddaughter who is learning to play with her school rock band. Great size and such realistic sounds. The kids love the music selections to play along and Mom and Dad love the headset option. As a music educator, I am impressed by the realistic sounds and the foot pedals for high hat and bass drum. This will be a gift that is used and used. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Not for the real drummers.
customer_reviews.text: If you know how to play drums you'll break this guy pretty quickly. I have had mine for about 10 months, using pretty infrequently, and the audio is going out in the Aux out. The snare pad reacts about 60% of the time, sometimes random pads will react for no reason, and my music will just cut out when I'm playing. Honestly pretty disappointed. Would probably suggest the Yamaha.
customer_reviews.author: Jarek Jesionowski

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed with the latency ...had to return the merchandise
customer_reviews.author: glengoffe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome electeonic drum kit!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as described, and more! Bought this for my son but I'm leaning towards learning how to play it too!
customer_reviews.author: Ronin

customer_reviews.title: Great drum pads!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the drum set pads for practice. It's easy to move and easy to set up. The sound is fantastic. Works well with batteries. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: RLeo

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my husband who is by no means a professional. He likes it. I don't use it so I have no input on the mechanics.
customer_reviews.author: Dajota

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: This drum pad set is absolutely amazing. My boyfriend is an avid drummer and it can keep up with his pace plus some.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Brown

customer_reviews.title: So much variety and great value!
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I wanted a light-weight, authentic-sounding, portable drum set. It is all that and more! The sounds are amazing and the variety is astounding. It will take me a while to learn about all of this little machine's capacities, but I'm excited. The price is amazing for the quality of the product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT in a separate box
customer_reviews.text: No idea if it works, but so sad that it didn't come in an unmarked box. It is Christmas season and that was the big surprise for my child. And yes, he got home first and saw it. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna K Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! The best portable drum kit I’ve ever owned. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: N. Boisjolie

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun , fun
customer_reviews.text: I like the 'practice' option so that it's me playing the drums in the songs. I like how each of the pads flash so you know which drum pad to hit
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Oh is this thing ever fun! Has many programmable drum kits and you can ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh is this thing ever fun! Has many programmable drum kits and you can also assign over 300 sounds to your pads and make a custom kit. I have already caught myself needing to get to bed after midnight!
customer_reviews.author: Flipp

customer_reviews.title: He is able to plug the drum set into his computer and make his own awesome drum scores
customer_reviews.text: My 35 year old son loves it. He is a guitarist who writes, records and produces his own music. Though his brother is a super-sonic drummer, he prefers his music to be totally his own. He is able to plug the drum set into his computer and make his own awesome drum scores. Again, your drum set is being used professionally by a very happy musician.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes playing drums. He loves it. Good sound!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Alot of drums and in a compact space-arrived quickly- would HIGHLY recommend this
customer_reviews.text: bought this for our 10 year old grandson---not alot of space for a full size drum set- he LOVES it! . fIT THE BILL perfectly- LOVES PLAYING THIS. Alot of drums and in a compact space-arrived quickly- would HIGHLY recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Doug B.

customer_reviews.title: Great when space is limited
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall appearance. I placed in on a snare stand I had and it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sulkowski

customer_reviews.title: Our son love's this drum kit... favorite gift from Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Our son love's this drum kit... favorite gift from Christmas! He's in 6th grade and in the band and love to practice on this drum set. We also have headphone's that he can plug in so he can listen only. Works awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Scott & Holly Schuemann

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son as a Christmas present. He is a beginner, only tapping his fingers on a table top, and within 7 days has mastered all the learning mode. It sounds just like a huge trap set, without driving his mom mad from the loudness by plugging in the headphones. We also purchased the stand and chair from Pyle.
customer_reviews.author: William Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Quality and craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Huge variety, quality sound, portable. Works great with our family traveling "band". Skin tension could improve for more effective rudiments.
customer_reviews.author: William H Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great desktop electronic drumkit
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 7 year old so he has a lot to learn! Our only fault is the foot pedals are on a wire too short to reach the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: BEST VALUE! SOLID CONSTRICTION!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect "not a toy" level construction. Better than expected sound quality. Light up pads excellent teaching tool. Very capable unit for the price. Recommend supplemental insurance only due to low cost total and you do beat em up all the time!
customer_reviews.author: jeff rasel

customer_reviews.title: Very realistic sounding.
customer_reviews.text: It sounds amazing for the price and there are many preset drum kits and you can create your own from the library of voices that has several hundred to choose from. It also has songs to play to and a learning mode. Very cool.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Trippett

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, and good practice for someone living near others
customer_reviews.text: Do you have neighbors that hate loud noises? Me too, so I bought this and can play drums all the way through the am without waking the beasts upstairs. Buy one and have fun like I do, you won't regret!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent with a few, small issues
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little too much pressure to make a sound on the pads and pedals. Many of the preset kits sound very similar. Wish there was more variance with them. Otherwise, a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Diggs Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best item I have bought in a long time
customer_reviews.text: This is the best item I have bought in a long time. The sound quality is awesome!!! I bought this for my son to start his band , but needed a traveling size drum set so this works perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great Drum set
customer_reviews.text: This Drum set is everything i had expected it sounds great and works well too i am very please with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney James

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun, but can't plug in the second pedal, seems I only have a hole for one of the pedals
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pad
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great tool for any and all drummers to have to improve their skills and sound quality. It is very fun and intuitive, this pad has so many different options for any sound that you're after. I would definitely recommend this electronic pad for all drummers!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for practicing and recording neat percussion
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect electric drum set for the money I love it
customer_reviews.author: John Boman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome when run through a good audio interface
customer_reviews.text: plugged this guy into my apollo added some compression and bam awesome drum sound. It is kinda cheap looking and when using with batteries mine randomly turns off. but if you want an easy electronic drum setup to add to your songs/mixes this does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound Lots of Features
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a very nice drum kit. It is a Christmas present so will know more later.
customer_reviews.author: KRM

customer_reviews.title: great for home practice
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner and this has been great for practice. Lots of functionality packed in here.
customer_reviews.author: s.k.

customer_reviews.title: Great Drums
customer_reviews.text: This set is better than my full size Roland. The sound is even better and it tales up much less space.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR.
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT PERFORM THE WAY I HAD HOPED. I SHOULD GET THE ELECTRONIC DRUM SET. IS IT POSSIBLE TO RETURN THIS FOR CREDIT ON MY ACCOUNT?
customer_reviews.author: Art Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old has been beating it up for weeks and it has held up. There are a lot of different kits and sounds that are fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Suwannee Man

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful price.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a most perfect drum machine but I only wish that the foot pedals were larger.
customer_reviews.author: ricky wayne stevens

customer_reviews.title: Christmas  Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift so can't review until later!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Leyva

product_meta.title: Pyle 7 Pad, Kick Bass Pedal Controller USB AUX Toms, Hi-Hat, Snare Drums, Cymbals-PTED06 (PTED06)
product_meta.description:
Style:Electronic Drum kitPyle Model : PTED06

TABLETOP DIGITAL DRUM MACHINE KIT
ELECTRONIC TABLETOP DRUM MACHINE - DIGITAL DRUMMING KIT
Features:All-in-One Electronic Drum KitCompact & Portable Tabletop DesignHundreds of Built-in Sounds, Songs & Drum KitsMake Your Own Music: Connect to Computer & Unlock MoreRecord, Save & Edit Your Drum RecordingsDrum Trainer: Learning Mode Perfect for BeginnersConnect & Stream Audio from External DevicesEffectively Reproduces Complete 'Drum Set' Sounds (7) Drum Pads with Touch Sensitivity:Tom-Toms, Hi-Hat, Snare Drums, Crash & Ride Cymbals (2) Digital Foot Pedal Controllers:Hi-Hat & Bass Drum PedalsTempo/Beat/Rhythm/EQ/Volume AdjustmentHand Percussion Mode: Touch-Responsive PadsLED Digital Display with Button Control Center*Optionally Battery Powered: Requires (6) x ‘C’ Batteries, Not IncludedHeadphone Jack, 1/4’’ InputBuilt-in MetronomeIncludes Drum SticksWorks for Mac & PC
What's in the Box:Tabletop Digital Sound Module (2) Digital Foot PedalsDrum SticksWall Power Adapter
Technical Specs:Cymbal & Drum Sounds: 300+Audio Drum Kits: 65 (55 Preset + 10 Custom)Musical Songs: 120 USB Input: Type BAudio Filetype Created: .MIDI External Device Connection: Aux (3.5mm) InputAudio Processing Support: 8/16bit, Mono/StereoMAX Wav Support Capacity: 16MBPower: 120V (12V Power Adapter)
The Pyle Tabletop Digital Drum Kit is an all-in-one wonder. Enjoy customizable sound and compact portability with this versatile drumming machine. It’s loaded with hundreds of built-in sounds, songs and drum kits -- making each of the seven touch-sensitive drum pads capable of producing a wide range of realistic drum audio. You’ll also have the ability to make your own music! Connect the drum kit to your computer -- record, save & edit your drum recordings. Built-in speakers to plays your audio, or envelope yourself in percussive rhythms by plugging in your own headphones. System also includes two digital foot pedals so you can get the real feel of a kick drum and hi-hat pedal. Additional features include the integrated ‘Drum Trainer Mode’ that’s perfect for beginners, ‘Hand Percussion Mode’, built-in metronome, digital LED display button control center, along with sound configuration adjustments to the tempo, beat, rhythm and EQ settings. The system is also optionally powered, requiring (6) x ‘C’ batteries, making it convenient for wireless and portable drum sessions. Drum along, or create your own song, with the Pyle PTED06 Electronic Tabletop Digital Drum Machine!
feature_bullets: COMPLETE DRUMSET SOUND: This electronic drum kit has 7 drum pad and hi-hat and kicks bass drum digital pedal controller to reproduce full drumset sound with tom-toms, hi-hat, snare, crash and ride cymbal perfect for professional and beginner

PRESET DRUM KITS: Pyle portable electric tabletop drum set machine comes packed with 55 preset + 10 custom preloaded drum kits, 300+ cymbal/drum sounds, and it also has a drum trainer learning mode for beginners/starter

DIGITAL CONTROL PANEL: The drums digital top panel control center comes equipped with an LCD screen and a ton of audio configuration controls that will allow you to create, record, and edit some truly unique and customizable music

CONNECT TO MAC AND PC: connect the table drum to your computer using a USB cable to act as a MIDI Connection for your favorite desktop software. it also has an AUX in jack for connecting other devices and a phone out jack for amplifiers of headphone

PLAY THE DRUMS ANYWHERE: This portable drum kit is powered by the included AC adaptor or you can go wireless and runs on (6) x ‘C’ battery so you can take it wherever you go and it comes with drumsticks which are perfect for drumming practice

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars380 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
